website_summaries.verdict: This mid-level model has the functions and features to fit most consumers' needs, all at a reasonable price point.
pros: Provides a comfortable cuff that fits most users well and a vivid display that's easy to read
Stores as many as 80 readings and has Bluetooth connectivity
cons: Some inaccuracies noted, a common issue with home BP monitors
Rare reports of problems with the Omron app

customer_reviews.title: Omron Silver is a genius BP monitor!
customer_reviews.text: To date. I have owned 4 BP cuff monitors, recently returning two other brands due to inaccurate measurements and difficulty of use. Omron Silver is a genius BP monitor! The cuff is pre- formed and adjusts easily-- a breeze compared to all previous brands! I am able to store all BP readings via Bluetooth, with the option to manually enter readings done at doctor's visits. Another plus is that I can print out, or forward, a chart of the readings, or a simple file. No more hand logging on paper! Have already recommended Omron Silver to a couple of friends! Thank you for such a great product at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Found out I was getting readings that were 8-10 points higher than they were by manual or other readings by doctors at the Mayo Clinic. When I contacted customer support, they told me I was saying it incorrectly, then proceeded to go through a series of games with me on why it was too tight, or too loose, or not placed correctly, or I should be sitting differently, or not have drank water, or should’ve slept better, or took too many readings in a week, or didn’t take enough readings... said differently: Omron didn’t care. They got their money and the machine I have is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wilde

customer_reviews.title: What to do?
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a accurate BP monitor. Talked to my Cardiologist and he recommended Omron. The reviews were good so I ordered one. I've taken two of these to my Cardiologist to verify their readings, both 20 off. A suggestion to all of you, when you get a any monitor check it out against your doctors readings. If you can't trust it what's the use in taking your BP?
customer_reviews.author: stephen thomas

customer_reviews.title: NO ADAPTER
customer_reviews.text: Omron doesn't ship this unit with an adapter although there is a slot to plug one in. All you get are 4 AA batteries and you're left hanging once they go dead. And they say "We are powering the mission toward eliminating cardiac events"...WHAT A JOKE!
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: I really like this blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I did a little research about home blood pressure monitors. I found that the ones that are to be used on your wrist read higher than the ones with the cuff for the upper arm. So that's not for me if I want an accurate reading. Reason that the wrist cuffs are not accurate, I read that the blood vessels in the lower arm / wrist are deeper and there for the reading is not as accurate as taken in the upper arm. This monitor has a BlueLink to download the readings onto the app on my phone. I really like that. EASY TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: E. Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Only The Best Blood Pressure Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is an established name in BP monitors. I've owned a wrist model also by Omron and is still working but just wanted a more accurate back up BP monitor. The bluetooth is a nice feature being able to keep a history of your readings and can have multiple users using their own Omron account. It has the option of using A/C by purchasing a separate adaptor. The arm cuff is easy to slide on and remove. Display is large and clear. It also averages your readings if you take more than one reading within 10 minutes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cebunderwater

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Product is so inaccurate. I bought it after my last Dr visit and went back to Dr because my pressure was very high. He used his machine which was normal and then mine which was so high. It can't be calibrated so it is worthless. I can't return back to Amazon because too much time went by. It cost me this money and another Dr visit to tell me it is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you’re short, buy a different monitor!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It should say if you’re a short person that this does not work for you. I am 5 foot three and can’t get an accurate reading. I don’t have enough between my shoulder to elbow on my bicep to get a good reading. this product should say or should come with a custom cuff . it doesn’t come with a custom cuff and the cuff does not work for people who are short I’m 5’3” it does not work! I can’t get a good reading and so zero stars!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Postel

customer_reviews.title: The reading is way too off - I demand a refund even though it just passes 30 trial period
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dad, who has high blood pressure. Each time he goes to hospital, the reading would be around 160. However, during the same day, when he uses this product, the reading would be around 120. It is too different. On top of that, if he use this product 3 times at once, each reading become 10 points lower. Initially, we thought my dad doesn't have high blood pressure any more, but it is not the case. IT IS NOT FAIR! I demand a refund even though it just passes 30 trial period
customer_reviews.author: Yin Chang

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Cuff was tight and the pressure in the cuff was greater than when my BP was taken at doctor's office. It stayed at the highest pressure in the cuff longer too. It recorded that my BP was high and would remind me to take my medicine. I took it to the doctor's office and after having my BP taken four times over the length of my visit was told my BP was good and the Omron recorded the numbers 19 points higher than the highest pressure they recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: First reading always off
customer_reviews.text: Used for about a week. First reading was always 20 points higher than subsequent readings. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Petr

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but incredibly sensitive electronics
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor to replace my 20 yr old Omron. I was struck by the fact you can transmit your readings via app to your IPhone. But the bluetooth feature does not work consistently. I also had trouble getting error messages. I have to admit, however, that Omron's customer service is outstanding, and they helped navigate the error messages I was consistently getting. The bluetooth part still remains a mystery, but you can always enter readings manually into the system. No big deal. I'll work that out eventually. I've decided to keep it. Omron's a top brand and has a great reputation (and superb customer service). I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Winik

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe anxiety and can never get a decent BP reading at the docs office. So I was able to use this machine everyday to ensure the doc that all I have is anxiety and not real HBP. Saved me from taking unnecessary meds. Of course my doc did other tests to confirm but this was a big part of it. I believe the low ratings are due to not using the product correctly. Ensure you read the instructions properly. I know I did not at first and my anxiety messed up my first few readings. If it’s still messed up after using it properly get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: marcia torres guerra

customer_reviews.title: A good cuff for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: As a physician, I‘ve recommended Omron for years. As I get older, it’s time for me to get a BP cuff for home. This is a newer model, and it is smaller and quieter that the Omron “loaner” cuff we have at the office. Omron cuffs are accurate and dependable. For $50, it’s a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Courtesy

customer_reviews.title: Arm Band is Small But Device Is Simple to Use & Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The device is simple to use (right out of the box, after batteries are installed) and it seems fairly accurate. The high blood pressure warning indicator is also a nice touch. My only gripe lies in the small arm wrap. The machine will error if you do not wrap it fully but the small size makes it difficult to avoid these errors for people with larger upper arm measurements (be that from muscle or fat).
customer_reviews.author: C. Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup, love the bluetooth feature. The free app. is nice love the graph to see over view of the readings. Cluff is easy to slide up onto your arm. Took B/P readings on patients for years the old fashion way in the 80s and 90s. Always skeptical toward automatic machines. But, they have come a long way and this company has been around a long time. Appears to be sensitive machine and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use but the readings aren't reliable. I'll be seated for a while, take a reading, then repeat in 5 minutes and the numbers will be 20-30 mmhg different. I wish I thought to return it before today because it's just sitting on the shelf, not being useful. Return window closed yesterday. :( I thought if I spent $50 I would get a quality device. Not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy?
customer_reviews.text: I have doubts about accuracy. I asked the nurse to check my blood pressure with their monitor and then mine. See the picture for the difference. I think these monitors are automatic so you cannot calibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it works
customer_reviews.text: My husband's doctor requested that he take his blood pressure three times a day. Sometimes the readings are so different it's hard to believe blood pressure can fluctuate that much in one day by such extreme amounts. Sometimes he gets E-reports five or six times in a row. If he gets a good reading, he takes it. Blood pressure machines installed in supermarkets and pharmacies provide a much more accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This device is extremely easy to use, works fast and sinks data to the app on your phone so you can track it. Very convenient and very accurate. I bought it after researching consumer reports and other authoritative medical reviews and I am happy with the decision to spend a bit more money to buy a product from a well-known reputable Japanese brand over a cheap, no name Chinese knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Aleia

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, my blood pressure was higher than usual. Happened every time I took it. Fortunately, two days later I had an appointment with my cardiologist and tested it against theirs. Same readings. High blood pressure is a new thing for me. I'm 78 and have apparently gotten away with a lot in my younger years. Knowing it is accurate is reassuring. It is very easy to use and I love the pre-formed cuff. Readouts are simple for an older person to understand and see.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ware

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed that I can't return this. I have been registering very high on this cuff and finally, yesterday, my PA had me come in to get checked and bring it along. It measures ATLEAST 20 degrees higher than it should be. Yes, you BP is still high but now I know this is totally inaccurate!!!!! Then, because I trusted this thing and monitered my blood pressure with it I have missed the return date by 4 days! Sorry but I think that is unacceptable!!! Certainly hope you can help me out somehow!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: There are so many of these readers it's hard to figure out which one to buy. I really just threw a dart and got this one. I made a good choice. Easy to use but a little tricky linking it to my bluetooth capability on my iPhone. Is it accurate? I don't know but I have to trust it works since I don't have another to calibrate it to. It 'seems' to be accurate. I use it every day and I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, the fancy tech amenities are not intuitive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand at my doctor’s recommendation. It is quick, lightweight, and convenient. The numbers appear to be accurate. I love that I can see the reports on the app. The act of actually checking your blood pressure is super easy, it’s all the extra stuff that gets a little complicated. I’m a millennial who loves technology, AND I read the instructions, and I still had a little struggle figuring out how to use the fancy features.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not to be relied upon
customer_reviews.text: I used this device several times a week, to monitor blood pressure after a change in medications. After several very high readings, I visited my primary care doc, and found its readings were 20 to 40 points higher (systolic) than my doc's. This was a back-to-back comparison, with no time lag. This is the second Omron device I've had which gave seemingly erroneous readings.
customer_reviews.author: SFNM Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arm cuff didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointingly, the arm cuff for this model did not work. I was unable to find a fit so will have to return. Also, the app and Bluetooth connectivity was tricky using the instructions provided
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Compared them to my doctor’s meter (both manual and electric) and they were way off. Had to return both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha M

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgraded machine but could have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice machine to upgrade from an old model. Bluetooth was a little confusing. I don't understand why my location is important to my readings so the required application permissions are aggregious but you can't use the bluetooth storage without allowing it. I also thought a wall charger was included, but it only included batteries. A wall charger is "optional". Replacing batteries is not my favorite so I was looking for one that plugged into a wall outlet which this one does but doesn't include the cord. You must buy it separately. Be aware as you are reading the descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Bagleys3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, app bluetooth fails
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but the app/ Bluetooth doesn’t work. Even when showing that it’s connected it still will not transfer readings from the device to the app. You can still keep manually however I would give this device five stars if it worked as it supposed to. Not sure about its accuracy ... i’m counting that it is - although it makes me skeptical when aspects of the unit or not working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: SirenSong

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had stage 3 high blood pressure until I compared the results with the doctors. My blood pressure is excellent yet this device showed me critical.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Swett Lewis

customer_reviews.title: way off
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed high blood pressure and bought this one because of higher ratings. The readings are much higher than in my doctor's office. I will stop using it but its past 30 days so i cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am getting high blood pressure trying to use this thing! I tried calling ...I am tech savvy but blue tooth does not work too late to return I waited to long to try it ! I would love to return it but certainly would NOT buy! Blue tooth even though paired will not dump info and you can’t tighten cuff alone it is just awful!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Machine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had high BP for years and when my old machine finally died I consulted Consumer Reports before buying a new one. This is the machine they recommended. However, when I took it to my doctor’s office to be sure it’s readings were accurate, we discovered that it is consistently 10 points lower than it should be. Very inaccurate. Aug 18th was the first appt. I could get with my doctor due to the COVID situation. Now I am left with an inaccurate BP machine as Amazon’s last return date for this product was July 23. (30 days after it was delivered although it Wasn’t possible to check it with the doctor’s machine until Aug. 18. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: As a RN, I check it occasionally with my stethoscope and find the systolic reading way off. If I had saved the original box, I would have returned it. Most cannot check accuracy so accept the readings. Also, not easy to use. An older person would have a difficult time wrapping around the arm
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I bought two, one silver and one platinum. They always show different readings... I end up keeping the platinum one. No one knows which one is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dmark

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended this and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and even easier to use. IT is so simple to use. It comes with batteries but you can get a inexpensive power supply to plug in if you will use it a lot. I use it daily and so far all is fine. Initially i tested it against a good manual sphygmometer and stethoscope, it was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It's an easy to use device, but can vary a little too much between measurements.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, but varies across measurements a lot. So you might have to average upon a lot of measurements to get it accurate enough. Apart from that, works gine and is easy and has Bluetooth connectivity. Uses 4 AA batteries, spend on some rechargeable battery if you intend to use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! It had my blood pressure so high that it had me panicking and sent me to urgent care where I found out I was normal. Definitely returning !
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very Good BP monitor-recommended by my MD
customer_reviews.text: Very good BP monitor. My doctor actually recommended it to me and said she got this model for her mom. I love that you can download an app that can sync to your phone via Bluetooth and track your results, even send them to your MD. I don't love the cuff because there is a more rigid part and a softer part. For me, it makes it just a tiny bit harder to adjust in your arm . It's not a big deal though. Allows you to be very proactive in your health care.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Not compatible with many devices!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you check to be sure your devices are compatible with this monitor. I was disappointed to learn that my mini iPad 2, my iPad 4 and my X-R phone were not listed as compatible! I could understand the mini iPad or even the iPad 4, but not the XR phone as that is a relatively new model. I made the mistake of not checking this right away and am now past the return date. It’s a disappointment for me, but not a must have, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all!
customer_reviews.text: Readings bounce up and down and are never correct. Read 174/95. Go to doctor same day and reading was 136/72. Stay away from this model. It's always way higher than it should be!
customer_reviews.author: E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Linking it to a mobile device is tricky and unreliable, but I think that is because you can't make something perfectly compatible with EVERY model of cell phone. Having a visual record to show BP trends is VERY helpful during doctor visits. It is much more accurate and reliable than the older, cheap one we bought at the local drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the machine it worked fine. I took it to my doctors appointment and it was reading 10 points higher than their manual reading. Then after about 3 weeks I kept repeatedly getting E1 and E5 error messages. There was nothing wrong with the air tube that I could see and I never had clothing on my arm. It was easy to use so I sent back for a replacement. This time only used it one day and the same thing started happening. I’m returning this one too.
customer_reviews.author: Tinesha Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Useless App and Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised that OMRON as a leading medical device supplier, especially for heart monitors, can have such a useless app (its not theirs) and poor connectivity via blue tooth. Thought they claim good for multiple users, the data is all mixed up between user! The direction just say 'manage appropriately'. Total cop out. Will be returning this - I was fooled by the brand reputation.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for about 5 weeks, it is easy to use. Unfortunately it is not accurate. Took a measurement before going for a doctors visit and it was only 30 min after taking the reading at home that they took a reading at the office. The high reading systolic was 19 points higher than the Omron reading. The lower diastolic reading was 6 points higher. So it is only good to see if your blood pressure goes up or down but cannot depend on the actual reading. Do not buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: jy

customer_reviews.title: Does not pair as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box unable to pair w/ smart devices - getting “E” (error?) on screen. Go to web site and guess what? My product not listed in their list for web inquiries. It’s just a pain to put up w/ this kind of product. I do think the systems is measuring my blood pressure accurately ... just unable to record in app. Now to the phone ........
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Beard

customer_reviews.title: ON/OFF Switch Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine when I can get it to turn on but the switch sticks. Overall, due to this, the rating is low. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgeteer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble getting the cuff on properly with my previous monitor. This one has a stiffer curve and is much easier to use. I haven't it up on bluetooth -- just enter the numbers each day. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: JJ Catfinder

customer_reviews.title: Yes, can take blood pressure. Nothing else works.
customer_reviews.text: I can take my blood pressure with it, so that's something. Unsure about accuracy. However, none of the other bells and whistles work. Can't set a date, can't set anything. Forget about Bluetooth pairing. It really shouldn't be hard to figure out based on the instructions. Not worth the money or any more of my time trying to make this work, I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: My wrist meter would give me various consecutive readings so I would not know which, if any, were right. This is very easy to use right over my shirt, and it has smooth pressure increases and decreases during its operation. I only read the quick start guide to easily get it working. Could not ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: an old fan

customer_reviews.title: BRAIN STROKE MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: OMRON SUPPOSED TO BE A GOOD NAME AND PAYED EXTRA. MACHINE GIVES FALSE READINGS SAYS MY CARDIOLOGIST. CALLED OMRON WHO SAID IT IS DEFECTIVE AND TOO BAD WATCH OUT DR BARRY
customer_reviews.author: SAD DAD

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually Great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally rated this blood pressure monitor as average. But now that I’ve had the chance to really work with it I have to say that it’s very good! The attachment hose was not inserted correctly and that caused the error messages. If you run into this issue check to make sure the hose is inserted snuggly into the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: RLD

customer_reviews.title: Accurate monitor but bluetooth is not depednable and often does not connect to the app
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job but the wireless function often does not work. I often have to forget the device in bluetooth and then reconnect before it will connect to the app. This is after calling customer support twice. This of course is frustrating because I paid extra for this feature.
customer_reviews.author: LA Tim

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend- will not pair
customer_reviews.text: Will not pair with Apple phone. Instructions are terrible. Googled for help and videos—- nothing fixed it. Spent an hour for something that should take one minute.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Good quality, I like that it takes AA batteries. I'm sick of lithium ion that degrade over time and render the device useless. I love the Bluetooth tracking, despite what all of the Karens and Chads whine about privacy. This is a good machine and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is easy to use and can be used without Bluetooth. I read a few reviews where people were complaining about accuracy but Consumer Reports rated Omron very high so I decided to take a chance and I am glad I did. I took this to my doctor appointment and it was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Mhart

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I like the device but the Bluetooth process could be improved. In order for me to sync it with the app, you have to press the Bluetooth button on the device and then select to transfer on my iPhone in the app. I would give it a better rating if this just happened automatically like other device/app integrations I've used. I would recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Dbl-Dbl 57

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have both this and the wrist cuff. I like this one better, it's less sensitive to movement and feel like it's more accurate. Being a first responder I prefer this style over wrist. The cuff fits very well. Is it accurate, I dnt know. I havent had someone manually take my pressure to see if it matches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay connected to bluetooth so essentially useless, instructions are no help. Save time and blood pressure, try another brand
customer_reviews.author: Billy Battz

customer_reviews.title: Great little model and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my older model by Omron. Works great and is accurate. My old one wore out. This one doesn't have error reads all the time which is nice. Added feature of alert for high BP three days in a row. Just miss the easy read light up display of old model. Numbers are in black, so I always have to turn on a nearby light to see readout depending on time of day. Otherwise, works great just like all my other Omron models did until they wore out.
customer_reviews.author: outlander22

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Returned the 1st one I bought because the averages were WAY off. This is the 2nd one. Averages appear accurate, but haven't had opportunity to check the accuracy against my physician's readings. Will update if I find inaccuracy when I compare to physician's findings. VERY easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tyla

customer_reviews.title: Error messages
customer_reviews.text: This thing gives error messages, not so much blood pressure readings
customer_reviews.author: BeckyB

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I haven't compared this during a doctor's appointment so I can't comment on accuracy. For now, I'm using it to track variation in readings for myself. It is easy to use and I love the app interface so that the history can be kept on my mobile device where notations can be added.
customer_reviews.author: T. Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Works with Samsung Health App (s-health)
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. Easy sync with my Samsung note 10 via Bluetooth and it worked with Samsung health app (s-health). Just went to accessories and scanned for devices. It found it, added it and synced to data.
customer_reviews.author: BenM135

customer_reviews.title: Readings are accurate
customer_reviews.text: Arm cuff is easy to slip on and secure in the correct position. With cuff properly positioned the readings are accurate and consistent. I took my unit to my last doctor's appointment and compared it to their reading on their expensive equipment. It read almost the same (within a few points) and they commented that was very accurate. Accuracy is the most important feature to me. I bought this unit to replace one that the readings were inconsistent and am very happy with this OMRON Brand. Transferring readings to the APP is easy and the APP gives you a nice graphic display of your daily/weekly readings. Inflates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Norman

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for someone intent on watching blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth doesn’t connect right. Still not ready. Then they email u multiple times daily and app notifies you.. just annoying right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Hellcatdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Grossly Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I have high blood pressure yet all the readings were normal high or even normal. We took multiple readings and got a wide range or results following the directions. This device is a scam. It will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good blood pressure cuff poor Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use to get blood pressure readings but the Bluetooth feature is unreliable and very frustrating. Device will not stay connected to Bluetooth and it’s a crapshoot to figure out how to do it the buttons do not respond as the instructions indicate they should
customer_reviews.author: K. Keener

customer_reviews.title: Bad cuff
customer_reviews.text: The cuff is a very hard, springy piece of plastic that is almost impossible to get on an arm. Trying to use it will definitely cause high blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many reviews and trying to decide what was the best for me, I chose this one. I absolutely love it, it’s very accurate, easy to use and I love the Bluetooth capability. Easy to track and show the doctor when I’m in clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Seems somewhat unreliable
customer_reviews.text: It seems somewhat unreliable. I've been getting E5 error messages and don't know why.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dawson

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use with reminders from the app.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the App is good too!! Keeps record of all my results with no effort on my part!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Blood Pressure Readings at Home
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended getting a home blood pressure machine since shelter in place and limited in person office visits. This is the brand recommended by the doctor. It is easy to use and gets accurate readings. It also has Bluetooth capability to sync with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Blood Pressure Easy to read, good read out, and good price
customer_reviews.text: I have had HB most of my life. Wrist cuff does not work well for me. Between Doctor and my Wife I'm tired of hearing about checking BP. I have had this one for awhile and it checks with Doctors readings, easy to use, and cuff fits my upper arm. Good price, easy to read, and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate !
customer_reviews.text: This product is not accurate. The wireless connection and upload to my app worked once only. I waited too long to return this product, unfortunately. It was easy to read but not accurate. A disappointment indeed!
customer_reviews.author: handisandi

customer_reviews.title: US only
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this here in the US but am unable to connect up to the app as there apparently are different Omron apps for US vs the rest of the world. Not clear to me why you would make it so complicated for a Blood Pressure Monitor. The display is easy to read. It seems to measure higher values than the doctor even though I am sitting relaxed home in an arm chair.
customer_reviews.author: LARS CHR FREISING

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this brand. I am on the whole happy with the cuff except it is stiff and unbendable. It pumps up so tight that it hurts. Im not pleased that they didn't give the option for a larger cuff. It seems accurate and the bluetooth reminds me to take my pills and blood pressure . I will have it checked at my next appointment with the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped transferring reading to android
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 months today it would not transfer blood pressure readings to android. Unpaired then uninstalled app then reinstalled app did a pairing took blood pressure went to app did transfer had 1 reading to transfer, but it did not record on android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was not calibrated correctly!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with cheap batteries, was not calibrated correctly, and when I called the service number all I got was someone reading from a script. I would absolutely NOT recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended this, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this machine. It is accurate and very easy to use. I tried a cheap one and it was useless. Sent it back and bought this as recommended by my doctor. It is well worth the money for accuracy and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Torregrossa

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my grandparents. It is user friendly and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to get the most complicated blood pressure monitor so I optioned for this Omron BP monitor. It is similar to my grandparent's old monitor so they immediately knew how to use it out of the box and the data is pretty accurate. Great option for anyone looking for a BP monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Tang

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Accuracy issues!
customer_reviews.text: Device gives 10-20mmHg higher results for both sys and dia compared to my old wrist cuff unit as well as compared to the results during my last doctor visit a month ago. The arm cuff is painfully tight and likely made too small — thus causing the elevated numbers. My arm is only 13” around so it should have been well within the stated specs. All in all, stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and syncs to your phone/app
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my Dr. Really easy to set up and use. Comes with 4 batteries and fits big arms too! I'm 6'6" 290 so some other cuffs don't work or read too high. This is quality stuff and I have plenty of room. Simple and sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: molded cuff with flap
customer_reviews.text: My other blood pressure instrument had a full wrap on it and sometimes it slipped down the arm or you'd have to rewrap. This cuff has a molded section that fits over your arm then you finish wrapping with the loose end. Press the button and wait for the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother, after successfully using an older Omron model at home for several years. It measured her blood pressure much too high, at emergency levels. Fortunately she had a medical professional with her that took her blood pressure manually and confirmed it was normal. I thought that being able to measure her own blood pressure at any time would be reassuring for her, but I had to return it. It is possible that this inaccuracy varies from unit to unit, but I didn't want to put her through the trial and error process.
customer_reviews.author: designertechie

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Silver
customer_reviews.text: The accuracy of the machine was over the roof It changed at least 10 points between two days and is not giving a similar reading if tested within 30 minutes I don’t know which one to take
customer_reviews.author: 𝓡𝓪𝓭𝓴𝓻𝓲𝓼𝓱 🏆

customer_reviews.title: Accurate;Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use. If you want to connect it to your phone, just download the OMRON connect app and pair the device. I compared it to my father-in-law’s BP monitor and it was accurate with his.
customer_reviews.author: Sje1979

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: With less than a month use the machine broke. I wouldn't use buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynjnyc

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I had the nurse to the house and she compared the readings to her machine and they were accurate. I had an old Omron for about 9-10 years and used it until it quit working. I think I got my money's worth out of it, using it 3-5 times a day. I liked that one so much I had to get another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This device works well
customer_reviews.text: It is accurate and syncs with my iPhone seamlessly. I take measurement in AM then open app and it syncs right over to phone. App is nice so I can send all my history directly to my DR or print out at home.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kent

customer_reviews.title: cuff is difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice device but upper arm cuff is difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: A.G. Salt

customer_reviews.title: I like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: First, Omron is good at making blood pressure monitors. I trust it. Second, I like its big screens and clear numbers especially it can tell you high if the pressure is above the normal range. Overall, very good monitor and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinemidnight

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the dr ordered! My 93 yr old Mother in law uses it herself. It’s that easy! Accurate results! The same one used in her drs office that her dr recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Stachowiak

customer_reviews.title: No longer connects to bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this device with my smartphone for about two days. After that it stopped connecting to my bluetooth. The first time was easy. Now it will now longer pair. I've cleared out all pairing info and started from scratch. No luck. The device no longer pairs. I am now entering info into the app manually because I can't afford to buy a different monitor. If bluetooth connectivity is important to you, stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tekniloco

customer_reviews.title: BP machine
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with accuracy. BP taken st home with machine is recorded as normal. But when I use other machines like grocery store, office wellness and go to the Dr. Office, my readings are considerably higher.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate by 10-15 off
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Very inaccurate readings! Tested versus doctors office. Waste of money and time. Shame on a company for selling a product is meant to help people with their health but yet it is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Roban L

customer_reviews.title: Fast and east to use, great app
customer_reviews.text: I got this one because it transfers the readings right to my iPhone app, just press the little button and it transfers, easy to use cuff, just slap it on and press start.
customer_reviews.author: photofpd

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Never wanted to read even after changing batteries, bluetooth wasn't the easiest it didn't just connect you have to push it to upload to your phone
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Miller

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch (cuff does squeeze a bit tight)
customer_reviews.text: Everything works very well. Measures very accurately and sends reading to my phone so I have the history. The only negative is the cuff pinches a bit tight...I'm going to see if I can get a different cuff.
customer_reviews.author: San Pan

customer_reviews.title: Omron B/P monotor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor seems to be consistent with the B/P readings that my doctor gets. It is easy to use and has a lot of nice features which my old monitor did not offer.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

product_meta.title: Omron Silver Blood Pressure Monitor, Upper Arm Cuff, Digital Bluetooth Blood Pressure Machine, Storesup To 80 Readings
product_meta.description: The Omron Silver Wireless monitor stores up to 80 Blood pressure readings for 1 user, and also features Bluetooth connectivity to sync with the free Omron Connect app for unlimited memory, graphs and trend tracking, as well as Unlimited users. It also works with Amazon alexa-enabled devices using the Omron Health skill.
feature_bullets: Trusted brand - Omron is the #1 recommended home blood pressure monitor brand by doctors and pharmacists for clinically-accurate home monitoring, and the #1 selling manufacturer of home blood pressure monitors for over 40 years.
Advanced accuracy - With Advanced Accuracy, an exclusive Omron technology, this monitor measures five times more data points for consistent, precise readings.

Unlimited memory and users with the free app - The Omron Silver Upper Arm Monitor stores 80 total blood pressure readings for 1 user. Memory and users are unlimited with the Omron Connect free app which works with Amazon Alexa-enabled devices (on select iOS & Android devices)

Easy-wrap cuff – The Omron Silver features the Easy-Wrap ComFit cuff, a pre-formed cuff that inflates 360° around the arm to help reduce measurement errors and help ensure inflation over your brachial artery. The Easy-Wrap ComFit cuff comfortably fits adult arms ranging from 9” to 17” in circumference.
Omron stands behind the accuracy and quality of our products, and believes in the longevity of our blood pressure monitors.
Note - Blood pressure varies constantly due to many factors including stress, time of day, and how you wrap the cuff. These factors may affect your blood pressure.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
